description: Grants the user the ability to manipulate gravitational forces at will. The user can increase or decrease gravity in specific areas, crush opponents with intense pressure, levitate objects and people, and even summon meteors from space.

users.circumstances: Issho possessed this ability before becoming an admiral, though the exact circumstances of how he obtained it are unknown.

abilityReveals.description: The user can control gravitational forces, creating intense downward pressure that crushes opponents or objects.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Issho uses this ability to instantly defeat Doflamingo's thugs who were cheating at roulette, pressing them into the ground with overwhelming gravitational force.

abilityReveals.description: Issho channels his gravity powers through his sword, wielded in a reverse-grip style, allowing for precise control of his abilities.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated when Issho draws his sword to activate his gravity powers against the thugs.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: Can affect multiple targets simultaneously with gravitational pressure, making it effective against groups.
Issho's gravity powers don't require vision to use effectively, compensating perfectly for his disability.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. As a Logia-type, it grants intangibility by turning the user's body into flames, making physical attacks pass through harmlessly unless the attacker uses Haki or exploits elemental weaknesses.

users.circumstances: Ace ate the Mera Mera no Mi at some point before his introduction, becoming known as 'Fire Fist Ace'. The fruit reincarnated after his death at Marineford.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: User can transform into fire, making physical attacks pass through harmlessly.
Fire-based attacks can cause massive destruction and damage.
